verbs.description: [ARG0: Samantha Bee] [V: apologized] [ARG2: to Ivanka Trump and viewers] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARGM-CAU: for using an obscenity to describe her on a segment of her TBS comedy show] .
